txt.en: 'Well done, [placeholder]! You really gave them quite a good knock! For your impressive display of physical skill, I shall give you a deserving gift.'
'Oh well, that was not quite what I thought you were capable of.\n\n'Try again, when you feel up to the challenge. '
The Mightiest Blow (Intermediate)
Now you should slot your club as a skill -- the fight will begin soon
'Now that you wield the mighty dwarf-club, you should enter the fight-arena and claim your prize! Stop at nothing, [placeholder]; do not let them deter you from your charge!'
You did not enter the fight area in time
The fight has begun! You may begin swinging

The fight-arena is the lowered floorspace in the centre of the arena, marked by green banners. The dwarf-club is in your inventory.

Gísli Strongclub has given you an excellent weapon to use during the contest. You should enter the fight-arena below while wielding your mighty dwarf-club.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the fight-arena after entering, you will drop your club. The club may not be used outside of the fight-arena's bounds.</rgb>
You have left the fight-arena. You may try again in 10 minutes, when the next round begins

The fight-arena's bounds are in the centre of the ale-hall at Thorin's Hall, marked by green banners.

You should wait for the fight to begin.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the arena's bounds after entering, you will drop your mighty dwarf-club. The dwarf-club cannot be used outside of the arena's bounds.</rgb>
Knocked a competitor out of the way ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Show everyone that you are a mighty competitor, give the other participants a good whack and send them reeling! \n\nSome competitors may stop moving to take the glorious beer, knock them away while you can, but beware -- if you leave the fight-arena for any reason, you will be disqualified.
You have dropped your mighty dwarf-club in the shock of shame and defeat
Gísli Strongclub is in the arena at Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should speak with Gísli Strongclub to boast of your excellence in collecting the glorious beer.
This round has ended; you were unable to best your fellows in time
You ran out of time
Enter the fight-arena before the fight begins. Do not leave the bounds
Slot the dwarf-club in your skills and wait for the fight to begin
Do not leave the fight-arena's bounds
Give fellow competitors a whack for good measure ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Do not leave the fight-arena
Talk to Gísli Strongclub before the time expires

You have been challenged to enter the glorious beer contest in Thorin's Hall, where the mighty compete for prizes and glory.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Greetings to you again, [placeholder]! 

'Take this mighty dwarf-club and prepare to swing it at your fellow competitors. Do not leave the arena, or you will be eliminated from the competition.

'Best of luck to you!'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The mighty dwarf-club will appear in your inventory. You should quickslot it to participate in the fight. This item cannot be used outside of the arena's bounds.</rgb>
